text: Dragnet is a 1987 American comedy movie, directed and co-written by Tom Mankiewicz. It is based on the radio and television crime drama of the same name. It stars Dan Aykroyd, Tom Hanks, Christopher Plummer, Harry Morgan, Alexandra Paul and Dabney Coleman. ==References== Category:1987 comedy movies Category:1987 crime movies Category:1980s criminal comedy movies Category:1980s buddy movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:American buddy movies Category:Movies about cults Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Dragnet (1987 movie)
